resources.string: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Use and you acknowledge that you have read the Privacy Policy.
Please select a unique username. Your username identifies you on Reactr.
Enter your mobile phone number to find friends and help them find you.
Reactr uses phone numbers from your address book to find the Reactr usernames of your friends.

- We will not spam or auto-add your friends.
 - We will not show your phone # to other users.
 - Phone # will only be used to find your friends
 - Phone # will be stored as unique mathematical
 representation (or "hashes"), which ca be used
 to see which users match, but are not the actual
 phone numbers themselves.
